mapper.select: SELECT QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME AS jobName, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_GROUP AS jobGroup, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_CLASS_NAME AS jobClass, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.DESCRIPTION AS jobDescription, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AS triggerName, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP AS triggerGroup, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.CRON_EXPRESSION AS cronExpression, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.START_TIME AS startTime, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.END_TIME AS endTime, QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_STATE AS state, QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TIME_ZONE_ID AS timeZoneId FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ON QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS.JOB_NAME = QRTZ_TRIGGERS.JOB_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_NAME AND QRTZ_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP = QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS.TRIGGER_GROUP
